languages.text: Джай Хейдари восхищена смелостью погибшего пилота и считает, что он был бы горд, если бы его снаряжение послужило потомкам в боях с еретиками и ксеносами.
Jae Heydari is impressed by the dead pilot's bravery and believes they would have been honoured to have their equipment serve new generations in the fight against xenos and heretics.
languages.original_text: Джай Хейдари восхищена смелостью погибшего пилота и считает, что он был бы горд, если бы его снаряжение послужило потомкам в боях с еретиками и ксеносами.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari is impressed by dead pilot's bravery and believes he would have been honored to have his equipment serve new generations in a fight against Xenos and heresy.

Jae Heydari is impressed by the dead pilot's bravery and believes they would have been honoured to have their equipment serve new generations in the fight against xenos and heretics.

languages.text: 死去的飞行员的勇气给婕伊·海达利留下了深刻的印象，她打算带走飞行员的装备。她坚信，如果飞行员泉下有知，一定很希望自己的装备能被人带走，在对抗异形与异端分子的战斗中再次发挥作用。
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari is impressed by the dead pilot's bravery and believes they would have been honoured to have their equipment serve new generations in the fight against xenos and heretics.

traits.locale_text: 死去的飞行员的勇气给婕伊·海达利留下了深刻的印象，她打算带走飞行员的装备。她坚信，如果飞行员泉下有知，一定很希望自己的装备能被人带走，在对抗异形与异端分子的战斗中再次发挥作用。

languages.text: Jae Heydari está impresionada por la valentía del piloto caído y cree que le honraría que su equipamiento sirviera a las nuevas generaciones en la lucha contra los xenos y los herejes.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari is impressed by the dead pilot's bravery and believes they would have been honoured to have their equipment serve new generations in the fight against xenos and heretics.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari está impresionada por la valentía del piloto caído y cree que le honraría que su equipamiento sirviera a las nuevas generaciones en la lucha contra los xenos y los herejes.

languages.text: ジェイ・ヘイダリは死んだパイロットの勇敢さに感銘を受ける。自分の機器が新しい世代の役に立ち、異種族（ゼノ）や異端者と戦ってくれることを光栄に思っただろうと信じている。
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari is impressed by the dead pilot's bravery and believes they would have been honoured to have their equipment serve new generations in the fight against xenos and heretics.

traits.locale_text: ジェイ・ヘイダリは死んだパイロットの勇敢さに感銘を受ける。自分の機器が新しい世代の役に立ち、異種族（ゼノ）や異端者と戦ってくれることを光栄に思っただろうと信じている。

languages.text: Jae Heydari ist beeindruckt von dem Mut des toten Piloten. Sie geht davon aus, dass er es als Ehre empfunden hätten, wenn seine Ausrüstung neuen Generationen im Kampf gegen Xenos und Ketzer dient.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari is impressed by the dead pilot's bravery and believes they would have been honoured to have their equipment serve new generations in the fight against xenos and heretics.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari ist beeindruckt von dem Mut des toten Piloten. Sie geht davon aus, dass er es als Ehre empfunden hätten, wenn seine Ausrüstung neuen Generationen im Kampf gegen Xenos und Ketzer dient.

languages.text: Jae Heydari est impressionnée par le courage du pilote et estime qu'il aurait été honoré de transmettre son équipement aux nouvelles générations affrontant les xénos et les hérétiques.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari is impressed by the dead pilot's bravery and believes they would have been honoured to have their equipment serve new generations in the fight against xenos and heretics.

traits.locale_text: Jae Heydari est impressionnée par le courage du pilote et estime qu'il aurait été honoré de transmettre son équipement aux nouvelles générations affrontant les xénos et les hérétiques.

languages.text: Cansız pilotun cesaretinden etkilenen Jae Heydari, pilotun ekipmanlarının zenolar ve kâfirlerle savaşan yeni nesillere hizmet etmesinden onur duyacağına inanıyor.
languages.original_text: Jae Heydari is impressed by the dead pilot's bravery and believes they would have been honoured to have their equipment serve new generations in the fight against xenos and heretics.
